title: Pubspec YAML File Schema
description: Schema for a Dart pubspec.yaml file. Note that this is reverse engineered and not the source of truth for pubspecs.

Dependencies.description: A map of package names to their version constraints or source descriptions.

DependencySource.description: Source details for a dependency (git, path, hosted, or SDK).

Environment.description: Constraints on the Dart SDK and other SDKs.

flutter.description: The Flutter SDK version constraint (if applicable).

Executables.description: A map of executable names to their corresponding Dart entrypoint files.

oneOf.description: If null, the main file is lib/<package_name>.dart.
The path to the main Dart file for the executable.

GitDependencySource.description: A dependency from a Git repository.

path.description: The path to the package within the repository (if not at root).

ref.description: The Git reference (branch, tag, or commit hash).

url.description: The URL of the Git repository.

HookUserDefines.description: User-defined configurations for indexed by package name.

^[a-zA-Z_]\\w*$.description: User-defined key-value pairs for a specific package.

HostedDependencySource.description: A dependency from a custom hosted package server.

hosted.description: The URL of the custom package server.

version.description: The version constraint for the package on the custom hosted server.

PathDependencySource.description: A dependency from a local file system path.

path.description: The path to the local package. Can be relative or absolute.

description.description: A brief description of the package (60 to 180 characters).

documentation.description: A URL for additional package documentation.

homepage.description: A URL pointing to the package's website.

issue_tracker.description: A URL for the package's issue tracker.

repository.description: A URL pointing to the package's source code repository.

version.description: The version of the package, following semantic versioning. Required for publishing.

SdkDependencySource.description: A dependency from a specific SDK (e.g., Flutter).

packageName.description: The name of the package. Must be a valid Dart identifier.
